OOC: May I suggest Cowboy Bebop? Excellent Anime, excellent, yes. Well, I n=
ote that Dragon Ball Z has one MAJOR flaw. The English version. Yep, that's=
 right, the English version. Do yourself a favor and get yourself subtitled=
 Japanese versions of it, it wasn't, and isn't anything like the English ve=
rsion...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: Kyle Stewart
  To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Monday, October 29, 2001 11:38 AM
  Subject: Re: 2
=


  DON'T YOU DARE PUT ALL ANIME IN THE SAME STUPID
  LOOPHOE WITH POKEMON!=
 EVER SEEN GUNDAM (any of them),
  ESCAFLONASE, OUTLAW STAR, DBZ, THE EARLY=
 SAILOR MOON
  CARTOONS, OR THE 08TH MS TEAM (I'm listing it seperate
  fro=
m the other Gundam cartoons because it deserves to
  be listed twice).

  -=
-- robertdahl <rdahl@...> wrote:
  > Alloran is right about RID, and =
all the other
  > things. Gobots was a rival
  > show, about the same, but =
it didnt have no where
  > near the impact with
  > storyline, or creating =
a whole universe. Their toys
  > were quite inferior,
  > and eventually Ha=
sbro put them out of buisness, then
  > bought the rights
  > to it. That's=
 why for a while in Generation 2 they
  > had characters named
  > Gobot, i=
t was a shot in the face.
  > 
  > I would have liked to see the Beast Wars=
 that the
  > writers would have
  > made if they had total control and an =
unlimited
  > budget. In my opinion
  > the guys who wrote that show were g=
eniuses.
  > 
  > I like RID, but I am not to fond of how Anime it is.
  > =
I'm not a big fan
  > of Japanese cartoons, and this one is no exeption,
  =
> it dosent take itself
  > seriously. The animation is beautiful however, =
but
  > the stories are not
  > very compeling. However I have read rumors =
that
  > Takara or Hasbro (i'm
  > not sure which one is the owner) will ma=
ke a brand
  > new series soon
  > revolving around Generation 1, but this =
is just a
  > rumor.
  >
